traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The spider has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the spider’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 hour.
